chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Dear Sirs and Madams, unfortunately I'm not getting along with my phone because of the switch from Android to iOS. Is there still a possibility that I can send back the phone, even though the withdrawal period has expired by a few days?
That would be very nice.

Best regards and many thanks, Patrick Wirth 

Thank you for your help,

The customer confirms that the product has not suffered any damage from a fall or water, and was not opened by a third party.

Dear ecomobile

customer asks f he can sent the device back, also if he is out of the date.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately as the withdrawal period has expired, we are unable to issue a repair/return for the customer. Please assist the customer and kindly close the case if no further assistance is required, thank you.

Regards,
YR
